data.oai_dc:dc: museum, ornithology, vertebrate, collection, birds, Occurrence, zoology|Specimen

The Goeldi Museum ornithological collection is the second largest in Brazil and the largest bird collection in the world for Amazonian birds, with a good representation of all Amazonian areas of endemism, and also the Caatinga and Cerrado biomes in northeastern and central Brazil, respectively.|Material with scientific and historical importance.|82,855 occurrences
